BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: tale_noun->[human_nameShortDef] ha creado un vínculo con [animal_nameShortDef]
image->[human_nameFull] forma un vínculo profundo con [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[human_nameFull] se da cuenta de su amor por [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->mientras [human_pronoun] mira a [animal_nameShortDef] a los ojos

BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] susurra cosas dulces al oído de [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[firstPawn_nameFull] lleva a [secondPawn_nameFull] de la mano hacia la cama [circumstance_group]
image->[firstPawn_nameFull] brincando en la cama con [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->con poca ropa a la vista
desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] y [secondPawn_nameShortDef] se miran a los ojos.
desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] está oliendo el cabello de [secondPawn_nameShortDef].

Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] sentando a [secondPawn_nameFull] a la mesa para una charla poco placentera [circumstance_group]
image->[firstPawn_nameFull] está de pie a corta distancia de [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[firstPawn_nameFull] empujando a [secondPawn_nameFull] fuera de la cama [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->en un momento de gran tristeza
desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] llora y se arranca los cabellos al mismo tiempo.
desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] a colapsado en el suelo y está temblando.

Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] diciendo sus votos matrimoniales a [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[firstPawn_nameFull] caminando hacia el altar matrimonial con [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[firstPawn_nameFull] agarrándose de las manos con [secondPawn_nameFull] durante la ceremonia de matrimonio [circumstance_group]
